title.rendered: Apply for ExxonMobil Graduate Internship Program 2024

content.rendered:
Looking to Apply for ExxonMobil Graduate Internship Program? this page has the necessary information for you.

ExxonMobil and Mobil Producing Nigeria have opened applications for the Graduate Internship program in Environmental and Property Solutions – Catering. This opportunity invites talented and driven individuals to share their innovative ideas with ExxonMobil, with the aim of developing sustainable solutions that enhance living standards and address the changing needs of society.

As a Graduate Intern, you will be an active participant in the Company’s one-year internship program, which aligns with our Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) objectives. This program supports the professional growth and development of recent graduates, providing them with exposure to the advantages of working within a multinational corporation.

Summary About ExxonMobil and Mobil Producing

Company/Organisation(s): ExxonMobil Nigeria.

Internship Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria.

Internship Duration: 1 Year.

Available Slot: Several.

Basic Qualifications: Recent Graduates.

Nationality: All Nationalities.

ExxonMobil Graduate Internship Program

At the core of our operations is a commitment to the safety and welfare of our workforce. We nurture expertise and proficiency through comprehensive training and varied work assignments. With a rich heritage of pioneering leadership and innovative solutions, we remain dedicated to providing affordable and sustainable energy to our customers.

We are extending an invitation to ambitious professionals to join our Environmental and Property Solutions (Catering) department. This presents a unique opportunity to gain practical, hands-on experience alongside esteemed professionals from diverse fields within our world-class organization. You will be encouraged to think innovatively, reach your full potential, and contribute to the advancement of the energy sector.

Intern Responsibility

Responsibilities may include but are not limited to the below mentioned:

  • Assist in Meal sheets/Request for Service verification and inspections documentation.
  • Track Daily Platforms requests/ complaints and follow up to closure.
  • Assist in Platforms Menu tracking compliance.
  • Assist to collate weekly reports and key performance indicators.

ExxonMobil Graduate Internship Program Requirements

To be eligible for ExxonMobil Graduate Internship (Environmental and Property Solutions – Catering), applicants are expected to meet the following conditions:

  • Applicants to this programme must be Nigerian with a degree BSc or BA in Business Administration.
  • Must have graduated with a minimum grade of Second Class, Upper division (2:1) no earlier than 2019.
  • Must have completed the National Youth Service Corps scheme (NYSC) no earlier than 2024.
  • Must be proficient in the use of computer and MS and other applications.

Preferred Qualifications/ Experience

  • Food Safety knowledge and certifications
  • Catering operations background

Steps to Apply for ExxonMobil Graduate Internship Program

  1. Visit the ExxonMobil career website and search for the Graduate Internship Program.
  2. Review the eligibility requirements and job description to ensure that you meet the qualifications and job expectations.
  3. Click on the “Apply Now” button and create an account on the ExxonMobil career portal.
  4. Fill out the application form with accurate and up-to-date personal and educational information.
  5. Upload your resume and cover letter.
  6. Submit the completed application form and wait for a response from ExxonMobil regarding the status of your application.
  7. If you are selected for further consideration, you will be invited to complete an online assessment and participate in an interview process.
  8. Successfully completing the interview stage may result in an offer for a position in the Graduate Internship Program.
